prompts.title: 1 Pet - Abstract Art
prompts.description:
Take the DOG from the photographic images, then transform the subject into the style of the last art image, and make sure that the subject's original color stays intact in the artwork.

NOTE:: THE COLOR AND EVERY FEATURE OF THE SUBJECT MUST STAY EXACTLY THE SAME. IT'S SUPER IMPORTANT. Ensure that the subject's eyes, ears, nose, facial markings, skin features, and coloring stay exactly the same in the artwork. It's important for better artwork. (IT'S NOT A PNG IMAGE, SO APPLY ALL COLOR ALL OVER THE CANVAS)

-- Make sure that every feature and color of the subject is perfectly copied in the artwork. Also, try to mimic the artwork style as best as you can.
-- It's an abstract-style artwork, so make it more like it.
-- Give me options with the new best color combos.

prompts.title: 2 Pet - Abstract Art
prompts.description:
Take the two dogs from the photographic images, then transform the subjects into art in the style of the last art image. Make sure that the subject's original color stays intact in the artwork.

NOTE:: THE COLOR AND EVERY FEATURE OF THE SUBJECT MUST STAY EXACTLY THE SAME. IT'S SUPER IMPORTANT. Ensure that the subject's eyes, ears, nose, facial markings, skin features, and coloring stay exactly the same in the artwork. It's important for better artwork. (IT'S NOT A PNG IMAGE, SO APPLY ALL COLOR ALL OVER THE CANVAS)

-- Make sure that every feature and color of every subject is perfectly copied in the artwork. Also, try to mimic the artwork style as best as you can.
-- Must make sure that all the subjects are included in the artwork.
-- It's an abstract-style artwork, so make it more like it.
-- Give me options with the new best color combos.

prompts.title: 1 Pet & 1 Human - Abstract Art
prompts.description:
Take the two subjects from the photographic images (A Dog and Human), then transform the subjects into art in the style of the last art image. Make sure that the subject's original color stays intact in the artwork.

NOTE:: THE COLOR AND EVERY FEATURE OF THE SUBJECT MUST STAY EXACTLY THE SAME. IT'S SUPER IMPORTANT. Ensure that the subject's eyes, ears, nose, facial markings, skin features, and coloring stay exactly the same in the artwork. It's important for better artwork. (IT'S NOT A PNG IMAGE, SO APPLY ALL COLOR ALL OVER THE CANVAS)

-- Make sure that every feature and color of every subject is perfectly copied in the artwork. Also, try to mimic the artwork style as best as you can.
-- Must make sure that all the subjects are included in the artwork.
-- It's an abstract-style artwork, so make it more like it.
-- Give me options with the new best color combos.

prompts.title: Modern Art Tigger Text
prompts.description: -- It's a Modern-style artwork, so make it more like it. (By modern style, I mean realistic painting art)

prompts.title: Black & White Art Tigger
prompts.description: -- It's a Black and White style artwork, so make it more like it - monochomic style

prompts.title: All Subject's Including Text
prompts.description: MUST NOTE::::  All the subjects must be included in the artwork; each and every subject must maintain its original color and features; the size of the subjects must be exactly the same as in the original image.

prompts.title: Be More White
prompts.description: MUST NOTE::::  Be more abstract, use more white bright colors. also uses other colors

prompts.title: Accurate Color & Style
prompts.description: MUST NOTE:::: COPY THE COLOR AND STYLE OF THE PROVIDED REFERNCE ARTWORK TO THE BEST ACCURACY
